messages.subject: from Wendy Priesnitz
messages.msgSnippet: The July/August issue of Life Learning is now available. In addition to our usual features written by and about unschoolers of all ages, this issue has a
messages.messageBody:
The July/August issue of Life Learning is now available. In addition to our
usual features written by and about unschoolers of all ages, this issue has a
fascinating interview with writer and speaker Sandra Dodd. Sandra, who lives
with her husband and three always-unschooled teens in Albuquerque, New Mexico,
covers a lot of ground from her concept of "strewing", through freedom,
learning for fun and what she calls "spiritual unschooling". Single copies are
available for $4.95 (includes shipping) by calling 1-800-215-9574 (VISA and
MasterCard accepted). Details, subscription info and a PDF version of the issue are
also available on our website www.LifeLearningMagazine.com.

================================
[Wendy sent this and asked me to post it, saying: " Sorry not to get to
this sooner. Life has a way of interfering with the best laid plans (in this
case, it's my 96-year-old mother who has experienced a very sudden onslaught of
dementia and had to be institutionalized)."]

There are photos of the kids there. The one that says back yard is front
yard, and otherwise, there they are. <g>


Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
